page.title: 03FARMING-Sandhills Farm
page.content:
This 86 acre farm is situated along the main road leading into the village of Thorner. There are between 20 and 30 acres used as arable land. Barley, oats and potatoes are grown. There are thirty two dairy cows, 30 "fallowers", 10 cats and a sheepdog! The farm has three tractors, harrows and ploughs.
The farmer eats some of the food he produces. Milk is sold to the Marketing Board, and potatoes are sold from house to house.
The farmer believes that the farm will eventually be replaced by housing.
